page.title: 15Farm workers and commuters
page.content: There is very little employment in this area. In Charney Bassett, apart from the few amenities, there are virtually no jobs, and most people commute to larger towns (e.g. Oxford, Wantage, Abingdon etc.). There is not much employment on the farms, most farms are run by the owner or tenant, with most of their employees being close relatives (e.g. sons and daughters). In this area there are approximately 20 full-time and 10 part-time employees on farms in total, and this includes family members.In most cases, accommodation is provided in farm cottages.
